roadmap.heading: Understand Quantum Mechanics
roadmap.title: Foundation of Quantum Computing
roadmap.desc: Learn the fundamental principles of quantum mechanics, such as superposition, entanglement, and quantum measurement.

list.desc: Study the double-slit experiment to understand wave-particle duality.
Explore the concept of qubits and their role in representing quantum states.

roadmap.heading: Learn Quantum Algorithms
roadmap.title: Key Algorithms in Quantum Computing
roadmap.desc: Familiarize yourself with quantum algorithms that solve problems faster than classical methods.

list.desc: Study Shor's algorithm for factoring integers efficiently.
Understand Grover's algorithm for unstructured search.

roadmap.heading: Develop Quantum Circuits
roadmap.title: Designing Quantum Logic Gates
roadmap.desc: Learn to design and simulate quantum circuits using quantum gates such as Hadamard, CNOT, and Pauli gates.

roadmap.heading: Use Quantum Software Platforms
roadmap.title: Programming with Quantum SDKs
roadmap.desc: Explore quantum programming environments like Qiskit, Cirq, and Braket to implement and test quantum algorithms.

roadmap.heading: Experiment with Quantum Hardware
roadmap.title: Accessing Quantum Processors
roadmap.desc: Run quantum programs on actual quantum hardware through cloud-based platforms like IBM Quantum or Rigetti.

roadmap.heading: Optimize Quantum Algorithms
roadmap.title: Improving Quantum Efficiency
roadmap.desc: Learn to optimize quantum algorithms for reduced error rates and efficient qubit usage.

roadmap.heading: Research Quantum Cryptography
roadmap.title: Quantum Secure Communication
roadmap.desc: Understand how quantum principles can enhance cryptography, such as quantum key distribution (QKD).

roadmap.heading: Explore Advanced Applications
roadmap.title: Real-World Quantum Use Cases
roadmap.desc: Investigate applications of quantum computing in fields like materials science, optimization, and AI.
